content:
News Reporter

Aerospace engineering junior Sravya Nadella left and nursing freshman Katie Nguyen skate along the path during Rollercade on Jan PERIOD  in the Palo Duro Lounge PERIOD The free event offered rollerskating an arcade a DJ and a photo booth PERIOD

Neon lights groovy music and screeching wheels on the tiles of the Palo Duro Lounge filled the University Center on Friday as students partied throughout UTAs Welcome Back Rollercade event PERIOD

Last Friday EXCEL Campus Activities hosted the second ever Rollercade event PERIOD Students waited in line as organizers set up roller skating and arcade festivities which included a DJ set a glowing cup pong table and arcade machines PERIOD

Haylee Jenkins EXCEL Campus Activities programming director said she was impressed by the amount of students that attended the roller skatingarcade hybrid PERIOD

Im always shocked about attendance with EXCEL activities Jenkins said PERIOD Last semester was my first semester here with this so seeing numbers like  people is really shocking every single time and its not something Im sure Ill get used to. attendees lace up their skates during Rollercade on Jan PERIOD  in the Palo Duro Lounge PERIOD Skaters followed a circular path marked with orange cones PERIOD

EXCEL began the preparation process for the event around December with the guidance of their advisors PERIOD She said they modeled the event after the first Rollercade which was held in  PERIOD

Jenkins said she believes the Rollercade may be coming back in the near future due to its good reception PERIOD It has potential to become a traditional event like EXCELs Halloween Casino Night in October PERIOD

The lounge was equipped with a number of flashing colorful lights to illuminate EXCELs goal of a retro theme PERIOD Free refreshments and popcorn were also available to all attendees throughout the night PERIOD

Electrical engineering senior David Ray was looking through the UTA event list when he came across the Rollercade and decided to give it a shot PERIOD Despite only having roller skated three times before he said he enjoyed his time PERIOD

The musics good DJs good I think they did a pretty solid job Ray said PERIOD

Skates line up for attendees during Rollercade on Jan PERIOD  in the Palo Duro Lounge PERIOD Attendees traded their shoes for skates once they completed their consent forms PERIOD

The EXCEL student body works together to create many different events such as the Rollercade and the process all begins with the students said Alexis Lambert Student Activities assistant director PERIOD

Two times a year the EXCEL student body votes on different ideas they have for new events deciding what will eventually come to campus PERIOD After the vote is passed students and faculty begin planning what they need to outsource for the event reaching out to companies and bringing their ideas to life PERIOD

We use a company called Game On Dallas that does the games for us they bring them on campus Lambert said PERIOD We dont own those or anything like that we rent them from that company and they have a plethora of different things that we can choose from. they planned the event intending to bring a unique activity to campus where students would normally have to go out of their way to experience PERIOD Instead of going off campus to an arcade bar or skating rink students could have a convenient experience at UTA PERIOD

PMalkomes

newseditor.shorthornuta.edu

News Reporter
